name: trpredeq3d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c3)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (w0 → TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= TrPred(c0, c1, c3))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c3)), wceq(c2, c3))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= TrPred(c0, c1, c3), c2 = c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wceq(c2, c3), wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c3)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= TrPred(c0, c1, c3))
⊣ (w0 → c2 = c3)
⊣ (c2 = c3 → TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= TrPred(c0, c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wceq(c2, c3), wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c3)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= TrPred(c0, c1, c3))
⊣ (w0 → c2 = c3)
⊣ (c2 = c3 → TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= TrPred(c0, c1, c3))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c2, c3), wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c3)))
body.pretty: ⊢ (c2 = c3 → TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= TrPred(c0, c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= TrPred(c0, c1, c3))
⊣ (w0 → c2 = c3)

comment: Equality deduction for transitive predecessors. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Feb-2011.)
